TopicTitle: Congratulations on joining the 10,000 post club, Red Iron Crown!

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Red Iron Crown has joined the ranks of sal_vager and NathanKell by reaching 10,000 posts on this forum today! Many of you of course know Red Iron Crown to be a very active member of the community, as well as being one of the most helpful moderators around. Given his immense post count, it's pretty much a given that you've talked to him on the forums at some point.

Congratulations on reaching this milestone Red Iron Crown!
He is building a post count of extraordinary magnitude!
Congratulation RIC! You earned it!
Congrats man.
Mazel Tov!
Wow 10,000 posts that's insane, congratulations dude.

Congratulations!

Your posts are some that I consciously seek out for their clarity, wit, and interesting information.

Thanks.

Happy landings!
Wow. I only have around twenty... How can you do something like that?

He is building a post count of extraordinary magnitude!

We can't repel post counts of that magnitude!
Yay! I'll go feed him a few rep cookies.
Congrats!

10K posts...

*think about a witty thing to say*

That's quite an achievement! You should receive a crown for that!

badum tssss

10K posts...

*think about a witty thing to say*

That's quite an achievement! You should receive a crown for that!

badum tssss

A Red Iron Tiara!

Well, let's say this Twinkie represents the normal amount of posting in the forum area. According to this morning's RIC sample, the current level in the forum would be a Twinkie 35 feet long weighing approximately six hundred pounds...

Well done RIC

Thank you all for your kind words.

This is the first online community in which I've been so involved and active, and that is entirely because this place is full of smart, funny people having interesting conversations. So thank you, everyone, for making this place so great and putting up with me for so long.
Gratz. That's quite impressive!
10k posts is now my goal >
He never talked to me i think,because this is my first post in i-dont-know months. I did take a break from crashing rockets.

He never talked to me i think,because this is my first post in i-dont-know months. I did take a break from crashing rockets.

Welcome back.
10,095! 95 in just 1 day! No wonder!
You rock Red!

Well, let's say this Twinkie represents the normal amount of posting in the forum area. According to this morning's RIC sample, the current level in the forum would be a Twinkie 35 feet long weighing approximately six hundred pounds...

Well done RIC

Surely you could pick a better reference than that.

So, does it feel different? Is it an entirely different kind of posting? Also, congratulations.

Thanks for the good words, and helping to hold the line against badposting. Keep it up!

I'm leaving my own post 1,000 - in a thread about posting milestones

Surely you could pick a better reference than that.

So, does it feel different? Is it an entirely different kind of posting? Also, congratulations.

What do you mean? There is no better reference than Ghostbusters.

I must apologize for not getting the reference used in your post...

I have changed the film I'm referencing in my post, pray I do not change it further

What do you mean? There is no better reference than Ghostbusters.

I must apologize for not getting the reference used in your post...

I have changed the film I'm referencing in my post, pray I do not change it further

I don't get your new reference, I was referencing Airplane.
